node.display_long_description:
Glue is a collaboration platform for teams who need remote meetings to be as great as face-to-face meetings. Glue brings remote teams together to learn, share, plan and create. Combining the best in immersive 3D graphics, virtual reality and cloud computing technology, Glue empowers teams everywhere to maximize their collaborative potential.

Glue offers both FREE and PAID subscriptions to is remote collaboration platform. Within the app you can create a Glue Team and Glue Account with FREE subscription.

FREE subscription offers you all the features of Glue including customizable 3D avatars, spatial audio, selection of persistent meeting spaces, full suite of collaboration tools and the team files storage for your files. 

With the FREE subscription, you can have up to 10 members in your Glue Team and create up to 10 Team Spaces. FREE subscription has a session time limit of 30 minutes per session.

PAID subscription options and upgrading your subscription at www.glue.work/pricing.

node.reviewDescription:
Quest really needs something like this.

A slick platform where both VR and flatscreen can meet and share. 

However...instead I found...

Unresponsive menu ‘buttons’ that just won’t work consistently , frustrating movement options (that joystick button is no good at all),  and limited functionally.

The avatar creator is not too bad...Just let me use my oculus avatar please. 

And i like having a menu button in my hand. Nice

Also — 50euros a month...per user.

I hope you nail it with Future updates , but I would hate to have to host or go to a meeting here at present.

developerResponse.body:
Hi Manochang,

Thank you for providing feedback to our app. Great to see that there are many things you like about the Glue. We will continue to improve the experience with rapid cycles, so you will see the app to continuously improve and add more features.

Also, we have noticed that our description of FREE vs PAID subscriptions was not perfect on the app and we have now submitted an update to the app description to clarify it. Here is how the FREE subscription works:

Glue offers both FREE and PAID subscriptions to is remote collaboration platform. Within the app you can create a Glue Team and Glue Account with FREE subscription.

FREE subscription offers you all the features of Glue including customizable 3D avatars, spatial audio, selection of persistent meeting spaces, full suite of collaboration tools and the team files storage for your files.

With the FREE subscription, you can have up to 10 members in your Glue Team and create up to 10 Team Spaces. FREE subscription has a session time limit of 30 minutes per session.

PAID subscription options and upgrading your subscription at www.glue.work/pricing.

Hope this helps to clarify that you can use Glue for free without need to upgrade / pay.

Thanks,

Glue Team

website_page_meta.description:
Glue is a collaboration platform for teams who need remote meetings to be as great as face-to-face meetings. Glue brings remote teams together to learn, share, plan and create.

You need to be a member of a Glue Team to use this app. You can create a free trial Glue Team within the app.
website_page_meta.title: Glue · Oculus Quest
